attributes.action: Keep internet anonymity in regards to ISPs sniffing and capping internet.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
"People who illegally download films and music will be cut off from the internet under Government plans to tackle online piracy."

I do not believe it is ISP's job to spy on users and it falls on to the user who is committing the offense NOT the ISP. The internet has always been and should always be anonymous. There are people all around the world committing theft online and yet our government wants to filter our downloads so that the movie industries don't have to evolve?!

rejection.details: No such proposals have been put forward.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
